page.topic: How do I open the TPL Code Editor for a Form Type?
page.description: In order to add TPL to events for fields or buttons, you must enable custom code for the form type.

description.p: Turning on custom code for a form type enables access to the TPL editor.
On the Designer tab, select the form design you wish to customize.
Expand the *[ui:Advanced Features]* section, locate the *[ui:Enable custom code for this form type]* property, and select *[ui:Yes]*.
Finally, click the *[ui:Edit Custom Code]* button to open the TPL Editor.

figure.title: Clicking Edit Custom Code opens the TPL Editor.
